title: E137 Satan's Little Helper and the Year of the Microwave
description:
We're asking the hard hitting questions this week: which came first the Pukwudgie or the hauntings? Em follows up on their Bridgewater Triangle story with a deep dive into the history of the Pukwudgie. Then Christine covers the horrifying 2017 abduction of Elizabeth Thomas. We're also considering re-taking our SATs - what do you think we'll get? And that's why we drink!
Please consider supporting the companies that support us!
Get $10 off your first FabFitFun box at fabfitfun.com when you use code DRINK
Go to thirdlove.com/DRINK now to find your perfect-fitting bra… and get 15% off your first purchase!
Go to CandidCo.com/DRINK and use code DRINK to get $75 off!
To match with your perfect therapist for a fraction of the price of traditional therapy, go to Talkspace.com and use code DRINK to get $65 off your first month!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
